usage_step_1_title: Invite the bot to your server
usage_step_1_description: Click on the "Invite to your server" button and follow the instructions to add this example bot to your Discord server.
usage_step_2_description: Make sure the bot has the necessary permissions to function properly in your Discord channels.
usage_step_3_description: Use the /help command to discover all the features of this example bot (limited to 100 commands per day).
usage_section_title: How to use this Discord bot
